intent_atoms.description: Provide a visual warning ribbon in the SwiftUI interface that alerts users to tolerant parsing issues detected by ParseTreeStore.
The CorruptionWarningRibbon component must display persisted dismissal state and accessible copy, and it should be layered above the navigation split view in AppShellView.
The ribbon should animate its presentation and reset the dismissal flag when no issues remain.
ParseTreeStore must publish tolerant parsing metrics and reset them with document lifecycle events so that SwiftUI overlays can react without polling.
DocumentSessionController.focusIntegrityDiagnostics() should hook into the ribbon to provide diagnostics information.
